item.title: Docker + K8s Workshop - Setup for Part 1
item.description: 1. Install Docker Linux Install Docker Community Edition for your Linux distro based on instructions available at the official installation page. Ensure that you can run Docker as a non-root user. Instructions for this are available here. Test your set up by running the command docker run hello-world. MacOS Install Docker Desktop for MacOS using instruction available here. Test your set up by running the command docker run hello-world.
